testscript.name: Full TCP Port Scan - OpenADR
testscript.description: Use nmap to scan for open TCP ports on the target.

param.name: Target:
param.hint: The hosts to scan. Any format used by nmap is acceptable.

param.name: Target:
param.hint: The hosts to scan. Any format used by nmap is acceptable.
